name: nextEvent(matching:until:inMode:dequeue:)
desc: Returns the next event matching a given mask, or nil if no such event is found before a specified expiration date.
declaration:
func nextEvent(matching mask: NSEvent.EventTypeMask, 
         until expiration: Date?, 
        inMode mode: RunLoop.Mode, 
       dequeue deqFlag: Bool) -> NSEvent?
